mapper.select: select aid,a.eid,title,a.state,a.content,a.cid,a.time,b.cid,b.cname,c.uname from table_article a left join table_column b on(a.cid=b.cid) left join table_user c on (a.eid=c.uid) where aid=#{aid}
select aid,a.eid,title,a.state,a.content,a.cid,a.time,b.cid,b.cname,c.uname from table_article a left join table_column b on(a.cid=b.cid) left join table_user c on (a.eid=c.uid) where a.eid=#{uid}

select aid,a.eid,title,a.state,a.content,a.cid,a.time,b.cid,b.cname,c.uname from table_article a left join table_column b on(a.cid=b.cid) left join table_user c on (a.eid=c.uid) where a.state not in (#{state})
select aid,a.eid,title,a.state,a.content,a.cid,a.time,b.uname from table_article a left join table_user b on (a.eid=b.uid) where cid=#{cid}
mapper.update: UPDATE table_article SET state=#{state},time=now() WHERE aid=#{aid}
